title: Life: Doctor Foster spin-off explores 'loneliness in big cities'
description: BBC One drama Life follows residents of Manchester whose lives intertwine unexpectedly.

title: Under-25s ‘give up dream job hope’ in pandemic

title: 'If you steal music, you aren't a real music fan'
description: The music industry is trying to clamp down on the latest form of music piracy known as stream-ripping.

title: Ai Weiwei: 'Too late' to curb China's global influence
description: The Chinese artist and dissident says the West should have worried about China decades ago.

title: The water-saving device wasting billions of litres every week
description: Low flush toilets often waste more water than they save due to poor engineering and confusing buttons.

description: Dublin's first Lord Mayor of Chinese heritage reveals the racism she and her family have faced.

description: The coronavirus pandemic has transformed the working lives of the under-25s.

description: The New York Times alleges years of tax avoidance, a claim the US president calls “fake news”.
